note: Vintage mid-century modern psychologist in Madison, WI, USA, specializing in neuropsychology, health & rehabilitation psychology. Active in healthcare financing reform, especially behavioral health. Mostly opinionated private citizen here, some evidence-informed, some not, you decide which is which. The guiding principle when creating humane health care policy is that we all have the same pre-existing condition.
